content: **crochet drops head band and neck warmer in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-472 yarn group e ----------------------------------------------------------- * **head band ** **size** s/m m/l head circumference approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm / 21 /22 - 22½ /23½ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50-50 g color no 50 dark rose drops crochet hook size 9 mm / m/13 or size needed to get approx 4 stars = width 10 cm / 4 * **neck warmer ** **size** s/m - l circumference approx 58-62 cm / 22½-24½ at the widest height approx 24 cm / 9½ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 150-150 g color no 50 dark rose drops crochet hook size 10 mm / n/15 or size needed to get approx 4 5 stars = width 10 cm / 4
